document.full_text: china called for dialogue to resolve the international standoff over iran's nuclear program, reiterating its long-held position that tehran is entitled to the peaceful use of nuclear energy, state news agency xinhua reported on wednesday.
document.title: china says talks are way forward on iran nuclear issue
lines_and_colors: china called for dialogue to resolve the international standoff over iran's nuclear program, reiterating its long-held position that tehran is entitled to the peaceful use of nuclear energy, state news agency xinhua reported on wednesday.
